name: Gift Card
description:
If you would love to send someone a gift card to spend at the Beautiful & Beloved Boutique either here or online you can do that here!  Just leave a note letting us know the amount that you would like the gift card for and we will send you a pay pal invoice for that amount {minus the $1 you spend here}.
Once the invoice is paid we will either email you the online gift card or we will send the gift card via e-mail.

name: mary clutch
description:
>>Materials:: Cotton  Measurements: 7 inches x 15.75 inches x 0.5 inches  Drop: 11 inches 

>>This envelope clutch has been hand-painted by Mary, a blind woman with a creative heart. Given a new chance at life, a chance to create, a chance to earn an income, a chance at hope and freedom

>>Every clutch is hand painted and unique so there are no two the same, ever

>>Features a snap closure, tuck away metal chain strap and a quilted interior.
